summary.p: Bullinger will see from the accompanying document the wish of Biberach [for a pastor] and the response of the Zurich council; requests to name any potential candidate.

div.p: Dear Master Heinrich, from this letter you will learn about the request from Biberach and the response of my lords. Therefore, if you know of or hear about such a man, you may inform my lords. They will then proceed further in this matter so that the aforementioned (the mentioned) from Biberach will receive a response.
